definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (´[[י]] hath strengthened, ´[[י]] stengtheneth; = As. Ḫazaḳi (i) au, Schr:COT on 2Ki 18:1 ff., Jäger:BAS i, 469; cf. n.pr. [[יחזק]] on seal Gann:JAs 1883 Feb.—Mar., 134 No. 7; —on format. v. Lag:BN 134) —

LXX Ecekiav, son of Ahaz, King of Judah, seldom † [[חִזְקִיׇּה]] 2Ki 18:1, 2Ki 18:10, 2Ki 18:14, 2Ki 18:14, 2Ki 18:15, 2Ki 18:16, 2Ki 18:16, also ´[[אַנְשֵׁי ח]] Pr 25:1 †; elsewh. in 2 K (exc. 2Ki 20:10) [[חִזְקִיׇּהוּ]]: 2Ki 16:20, 2Ki 18:9 + 34 t., 2Ki 18-21 ‖ Is 36:1 + 31 t., Is 36-39; also † Je 26:18, Je 26:19, 1Ch 3:13, 2Ch 29:18, 2Ch 29:27, 2Ch 30:24, 2Ch 32:15; in Ch use. [[יְחִזְקִיׇּחוּ]] 1Ch 4:41, 2Ch 28:27 + 35 t. 2Ch 29-33; also 2Ki 20:10, Je 15:4, and in title Is 1:1; † [[יִחִזְקִיׇה]] Ho 1:1, Mic 1:1 † (if [[י]] in these three be not txt. err. for [[וְ]]). †
[[חִזְקִיׇּה]] great-great-grandfather of proph. Zephaniah Zep 1:1, LXX tou= Ecekiou, perh. =
LXX Ecekia(v), [[חִזְקִיׇּה]] man of royal Davidic line 1 Ch 1Ch 3:23 prob. near time of Char. †
[[יְחִזְקִיׇּה]], LXX Ecekia(v), head of a family of returned exiles Ezr 2:16 = [[חִזְקִיׇּה]] Ne 7:21, cf. also ´[[ח]] Ne 10:18. †
[[יְחִוְקִיׇּהוּ]] LXX Ecekiav, an Ephraimite, Ahaz's time 2Ch 28:12.
